query: SELECT status, direcao, tipoDocumento, COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN xmlOriginal IS NOT NULL AND xmlOriginal != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as com_xml, SUM(CASE WHEN danfsePdfUrl IS NOT NULL AND danfsePdfUrl != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as com_pdf FROM notas GROUP BY status, direcao, tipoDocumento;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HdhHhoU3VLn73V.2659abed3564 --database 2ckaMFDgknxSWbaAs85a3h --execute SELECT status, direcao, tipoDocumento, COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN xmlOriginal IS NOT NULL AND xmlOriginal != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as com_xml, SUM(CASE WHEN danfsePdfUrl IS NOT NULL AND danfsePdfUrl != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as com_pdf FROM notas GROUP BY status, direcao, tipoDocumento;
